# clamp(to:)

**Instance Method**

Clamps the mutable entity to the specified rectangle.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func clamp(to rect: Self.Rect)
```

## Parameters

- **rect**: The rectangle that defines the clamp volume.
title: clamp(to:)
